content:
James Franklin head coach of the Penn State Nittany Lions speaks to reporters during a press conference ahead of the Rose Bowl game in University Park Pa PERIOD On December   PERIOD

James Franklin interrupted a Penn State team meeting on Monday to announce the programs next defensive line coach PERIOD

After initially opening the door Franklin turned back and shouted Hes in the room and pointed toward Deion Barnes PERIOD

Nittany Lion players then embraced Barnes a threeyear letterman turned assistant coach before Franklin and defensive coordinator Manny Diaz addressed the team PERIOD

All love for our guy DBarnes18 A special moment as CoachJFranklin announces Deion Barnes as our defensive line coach PERIOD  WeAre pic.twitter.comv1HHaz7HMG

Deion interviewed for this job every damn day PERIOD Every day Diaz said PERIOD His role may change but the standard of his work doesnt need to change

MORE FOOTBALL COVERAGE

Just two weeks after John Scott Jr.s departure to the NFL Penn State has found its replace
